hof.net

Class MessageProcessing

  • java.lang.Object
    • hof.net.MessageProcessing

  • public class MessageProcessing
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an important part of the network communication of this game. All received AbstractMessages are processed here. This class is designed as a Singleton so you cannot instantiate it, but get the instance over the given static method.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static MessageProcessing getInstance()
        Used to get the Singleton instance of this class. If there is not already an instance a new one is created.
        Returns:
        the instance of this class

      • processMessageQueue

        public void processMessageQueue()
        Gets the first element of the MessageQueue and processes it. This method has to be called in the render method to guarantee network communication.

      • getPlayerList

        public java.util.ArrayList<hof.player.Player> getPlayerList()
        Returns the list of the active Players.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of active players.

      • clearPlayerList

        public void clearPlayerList()
        Removes all players from the list of active Players. In addition to this all colors become available again.

        Returns:
